mapper.insert: INSERT INTO paper_wd (pw_name, pw_create_by, pw_course, pw_address, pw_key, iv, pw_auditor1, pw_auditor2, pw_addTime) VALUES (#{papername}, #{papercreateBy}, #{course}, #{paperurl}, #{paperkey}, #{iv}, #{auditor1}, #{auditor2}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT pw_id, pw_name, pw_create_by, pw_course, pw_address, pw_describe, pw_key, iv, pw_status, pw_auditor1, pw_auditor2, pw_addTime FROM paper_wd WHERE pw_create_by = #{username} or pw_auditor1 = #{username} or pw_auditor2 = #{username}
mapper.update:
UPDATE paper_wd SET pw_status = #{status}, pw_describe = CONCAT(pw_describe, '\n', #{remark})
WHERE pw_id = #{paperId}
mapper.select: SELECT pw_name, pw_create_by, pw_course, pw_address, pw_describe, pw_key, pw_auditor1, pw_auditor2, pw_addTime FROM paper_wd WHERE pw_id = #{paperId}
